product_name: Light & Motion Seca 1500 Race Bike Light
long_description: Whether you're competing in 24-hr races or sneaking in a ride after work, the Light & Motion Seca 1500 Race bike light is a superb light for cyclists that balances brightness, beam pattern and weight.
short_description: Whether you're competing in 24-hr races or sneaking in a ride after work, the Light & Motion Seca 1500 Race bike light is a superb light for cyclists that balances brightness, beam pattern and weight.
